eventSummary:
A bank insider allegedly forged names and used fake withdrawal slips to drain $75,000 from eight customer accounts. This internal fraud incident poses a risk to financial custodians and customer trust.
Sources:
- https://cryptopanic.com/news/23066179/Bank-Insider-Reportedly-Forges-Names-and-Fills-Out-Fake-Withdrawal-Slips-Drains-75000-From-Accounts-of-Eight-Customers

A Billion-Dollar Bank is reportedly handing out thousands of dollars to a data breach victim after a cybersecurity incident exposed personal information including names, social security numbers, and account details. This incident highlights a significant risk for financial custodians and their clients.
Sources:
- https://cryptopanic.com/news/23063970/Billion-Dollar-Bank-Handing-Thousands-of-Dollars-To-Data-Breach-Victim-After-Cybersecurity-Incident-Exposed-Names-Social-Security-Numbers-Account-Details

Ingram Micro experienced an outage attributed to a SafePay ransomware attack. This event underscores the vulnerability of service providers within the financial ecosystem to ransomware.
Sources:
- https://twitter.com/50026664/status/1941527257182306730
